title: Limited High-Technology Exports
description: In 2022, Belize's high-technology exports amounted to just $17, representing a mere 0.00018% of its manufactured exports. This highlights a significant gap in the country's technological advancement and export capabilities.

title: Investment in ICT through Public-Private Partnerships
description: In 2019, Belize invested $8.6 million in ICT through public-private partnerships, indicating a commitment to improving its information and communication technology infrastructure.

title: Children Living with HIV
description: As of 2022, there are 100 children aged 0-14 living with HIV in Belize. This statistic underscores the ongoing public health challenges the country faces in addressing HIV/AIDS.
